properties.name: application.domain-name
properties.description: Domain name of the server this application is hosted in

properties.name: application.sub-directory
properties.description: The subdirectory where the application war file is located at (if not deploying in ROOT location of server)

properties.name: run.with.external-service-api
properties.description: To specify whether to connect to external Bharat APIs service for fetching details about NIC employees

properties.name: nic-esign.secret.jks.alias-name
properties.description: Specify the keystore entry name from the certificate for esigning

properties.name: nic-esign.secret.jks.password
properties.description: Specify the password which will be used to access the signing certificate to esign requests

properties.name: react.application-base-url
properties.description: A base url where the react application server is running at (Mainly used for development version)

properties.name: nic-esign.secret.jks.file-path
properties.description: Path/location to where jks certificate file is stored

properties.name: nic-esign.gateway.main-url
properties.description: Esign Gateway url which will be used by this application to redirect user to when initiating process of e-signing application

properties.name: nic-esign.gateway.redirect-response-url
properties.description: Esign Gateway response url to redirect user back to this application on completing e-signing process

properties.name: publisher.application.max-time-limit
properties.description: A maximum time limit (in days) for an application to be active for esigning, after which the application will be locked and no longer be used for esigning
